name: AstroTrader
description:
A game built for NoMOeJam 9 https://itch.io/jam/not-moe-jam-9-

wasd for movement

click to interact with the UI

To save and load, go to the trading post and press save, to load press load.

You can only mine iron at the start, then you upgrade to mine gold, then diamonds and finally frankinium.

Your goal... To get 1 million credits. Good Luck

also please contact me if the build doesn't work

UPDATE 1.0.0

-Updated textures

-Save and load added

-Fixed exploits
